section.title: Search Result Type Options
section.para: The result type allows you to search for resources of any of the following types:

listitem.para: Vms for a list of virtual machines
Host for a list of hosts
Pools for a list of pools
Template for a list of templates
Event for a list of events
Users for a list of users
Cluster for a list of clusters
Datacenter for a list of data centers
Storage for a list of storage domains

section.para: As each type of resource has a unique set of properties and a set of other resource types that it is associated with, each search type has a set of valid syntax combinations. You can also use the auto-complete feature to create valid queries easily.
